top_comments.comment: *Vax does NOT reduce cases!* Cases are 69% HIGHER in the vaxxed group in UK. MSM is 100% lies.

All you anti vaxxers your right don't take it we need to thin the planet out anyway.
IN WAR, YOU DISRUPT THE SUPPLY LINES...DEMOCRATS & CHINA ARE DOING THIS NOW, TO AMERICANS!!!!!!

Maybe the non masker are just tired of fighting everyday.
Tylenol accounts for 50% of acute liver failure in the United States. Go get your vaccine

Because they opened up.
Cities with lowest vaccine rates have lowest Covid rates.

*Vax does NOT reduce cases!* Cases are 69% HIGHER in the vaxxed group in UK. MSM is 100% lies.
